nodes.bodyText: It doesn't look like GalaxyHistoriesService or IridaWorkflowsService is used anywhere in this file. Was it maybe used previously and now that code has been removed? Could these Autowired components be removed if they aren't used?
Good catch, I think that was left over from while I was trying different solutions for this problem. Removed those lines now.

Just to make sure I understand, the removal of checking for output files existence is because we switched to invokeWorkflow which returns right away (instead of waiting until the workflow is finished)?
